label.intro:
This case study is an evaluation of a large scale intervention which lives on the boundary between research and development. The study shows that the provision of climate information through structured training is seen to influence the farmer decision making process.

This case study is referred to in a number of topics including:

Topic I: Starting a research process

  • Types of studies and data
  • Data flows


Topic VI: Design principles

  • Controlling variability
  • Studying for diversity


Topic X: Qualitative research

  • Qualitative Research Methods
  • Qualitative data and analysis
  • Why vary and combine research methods
